portfolio.content:
Winner of the Cabinet Makers Association’s 2013 Wood Diamond Award
A complete makeover was the plan for this kitchen, which is modeled after one that the homeowner saw in a magazine. The beaded face frame cabinets with inset doors were finished with a custom color lacquer. The island is made from walnut that was stained, distressed, glazed and then top-coated with clear lacquer. The clients and their designer selected tile and hardware to complete the stunning makeover; we were thrilled to give our clients their dream kitchen.

A custom coffee bar is built in behind cabinet doors, complete with pocket doors and a slide-out shelf.
A custom coffee bar, complete with pocket doors and a slide-out shelf.
We also designed and constructed two built-in cabinets for the living room.
Detail of the island, the drawer face and the surrounding apron were all cut from one board so the grain would flow seamlessly across the end of the island.
Detail of the island, the drawer face and the surrounding apron were all cut from one board so the grain would flow seamlessly across the end of the island.
Inset doors and drawers give a classic look to this kitchen.
Kitchen, front view.
Kitchen fireplace with concealed TV nook above.
Adjustable pantry shelving.
Barn doors are closed to conceal a TV that is inset into the custom, paneled wall.
Barn doors open to reveal a TV that is inset into the custom, paneled wall.

Client Comment:

Dark Horse Woodworks knocked this out of the park! We came to Chris earlier this year with a dream, and he made it a reality. Yes, we had a picture as our starting point, but as we all know, that only gets you about 10 percent there. Chris and his team then had to figure out how to do that in our space. They combated crooked walls, an uneven ceiling and sloping floors –not to mention also dealing with me changing my mind a few times throughout the project!

Chris’s attention to detail is borderline obsessive, but we appreciated it. Not only does the cabinetry look beautiful, but it also functions beautifully – the key to a good working kitchen. Chris wasn’t satisfied until everything was perfect, and it paid off. We couldn’t be happier with the result. I’d highly recommend Chris and the Dark Horse team.

—Donna B.
